title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2021/94 of 5 August 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 1270/94 concerning the issue of import licences for garlic originating in China
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2021/94 of 5 August 1994 amending Regulation (EC) No 1270/94 concerning the issue of import licences for garlic originating in China
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following paragraph is hereby added to Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 1270/94:
'Applications for import licences submitted after 31 May 1994 and before 25 August 1994 shall be rejected.'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 August 1994.
For the Commission
Hans VAN DEN BROEK
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 338, 31. 12. 1993, p. 26.

(6) OJ No L 138, 2. 6. 1994, p. 32.
